r:
do you dare to see whats in the end of the bottle ?

Contact: drinkingproblemmspfa@gmail.com

p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/cover%20warning%20page1.png[/img]



[center][size=30][color=#93ff53]--WARNING--[/color][/size][/center]

[color=#93ff53][size=15]Drinking problem contains material, scenarios and visuals that isn't suited for younger readers or the easily disturbed. Names, characters, events and istitutions are NOT to be considered REAL. and requests to only be read by people over the age of 18+ and the main characters are over the age of 20.

warning tags:, mental illness (depression, anxiety, PTSD, etc), sexual/adult themes and visuals, nudity, I manipulation, death, blood, gore, violence, abuse, disturbing/graphic imagery.

Thank you for reading.[/size][/color]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/001_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/002_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/003_c.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]A young girl is standing in her double-sized respiteblock, and it just so happens that today is her birthday!... Is what she would like to believe - truth to be told, she only knows the number! So on the 9th of every month, she just parties 'till she drops![/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/004_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/005_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/006_c.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]She is also someone who commits to her beliefs - since she never learned the month or year of her birth from the Almighty Grubgod and Queen, she shall not remember ANY month or year for every day that she lives - only the number. (She is strangely proficient at maintaining mental order when it comes to stuff like that).[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/007_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/008_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/009_c.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]That being said, the young girl shall soon start her mischievous plan to hold a big, mindblowing party - which is going to be tricky. It's hard to be original when you throw a birthday party EVERY month. You might envy the once-a-yearers, but you have been nailing it for whoever many number of years you have totally not been keeping count of.
Defenetly not one of the stupidest idea you've had yet.[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/010_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/011_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/012_cC.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]But you ARE a master of decisions - your streak of mindblowing parties is proof of that, so it all balances out. Altough, completely unexpectedly, there seems to be a COMPLETE FUCKING MESS in your room; and it's not your fault this time! Glass everywhere, furniture scattered and a corpse; by the looks of it.[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/013_c.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/014_modifica.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/015_C.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/016_c.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]The raw, putrid smell of fresh blood is giving you the perfect scent to concentrate on your brainstorming - hell, it might've already given you an idea for this month's birthday theme!
That was easy, but you still have to clean up this mess!...is what you WOULD say, if you weren't filthy rich. Is what you WOULD say, if your current parental figure would allow anyone into your room.
CURSE YOU, OVERPROTECTIVE ADULT FIGURE. Anyway, you --[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/017_corr.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%201/018_c%20v.png[/img]

[justify][size=15][color=#5d007d]AAAAANNNNNDDDDD I've done goofed, got to get a hold of myself, i started narrating at the wrong page, ougghta fix this bad attitude of mine. Anywayyyyy - THERE. Found the page, now: let's have a proper start.[/size][/color]
[/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/19-gif.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15][color=#916cbc]Aheam, so.[/color] A young girl is standing in her double-sized respiteblock and it just so happens that today is her birthday!... Is what she would like to believe - truth be told, she only knows the number!  Since she never learned the month or year of her birth from the Almighty Grubgod and Queen, she shall not remember ANY month or year for every day that she lives - only the number, she really is someone who commits to personal beliefs. So on the 9th of every month, she just parties 'till she drops! [/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/20-gif.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15][color=#916cbc]WAIT WAIT WAIT, GROBDAMNIT THE NAME WON'T SHOW UP IF SHE DOESN'T KNOW HER MAKING DAY AAAAHHHH WHY DO I ALWAYS HAVE TO IMPROVISE???
She has ONE job, WON'T do it properly, AND leaves ME to fix BULLCRAP like this.
I stg next time I'll see her neck I will throw fonduta at it. 
And they better not FUCKING COMPLAIN or I will lose my FUCKING JIMMIJY JUMBLERS, I can't put up with this shit anymore. [/size][/color][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/21-gif.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15][color=#916cbc]I'll even fucking ruin this bitch's whole career by giving her a shit name AH.[/size][/color][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/22-gif.gif[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/23-gif.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15][color=#916cbc]TSK,,, noooo she doesn't deserve it and that cunt will just get mad at me, I really don't have the mental capacity to get another overload of bullshit that are her so-called rants.
Looking on the bright side, this is the first time I actually get to name a vessel, and a damn good-looking one at that. Yeah(?) you rock, I'll give you a proper name.[/size][/justify][/color]

[img=950x763]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%202/24.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]Your name is ROMANA NEKRIW and you shall soon start your mischievous plan to hold a big, mindblowing party - which is going to be tricky. It's hard to be original when you throw a birthday party EVERY month. You might envy the once-a-yearers, but you have been nailing it for however many number of years you have totally not been keeping count of.
Definitely not one of the stupidest idea you've had yet. But you ARE a master of decisions - your streak of mindblowing parties is a proof of that, so it all balances out. Altough, completely unexpectedly, there seems to be a COMPLETE FUCKING MESS in your room; and it's not your fault this time! Glass everywhere, furniture scattered and a corpse; by the looks of it. The raw, putrid smell of fresh blood is giving you the perfect scent to concentrate on your brainstorming - hell, it might've already given you an idea for this month's birthday theme!
That was easy, but you still have to clean up this mess!... is what you WOULD say, if you weren't filthy rich. Is what you WOULD say, if your current parental figure would allow anyone into your room.
CURSE YOU, OVERPROTECTIVE ADULT FIGURE. Anyway.
What will you do?[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/25.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]What in the actual living hell is a goddamn kaiji? You for sure know how amazing kaijus are, but that? You have no idea how it even reached the inside of your busy brain! Got to plan for one hell of a party for fuck's sake.[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/26-but-faster.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]You just wish for this voice in your head to JUST SHUT THE FUCK UP! You, have, no, FUCKING IDEA OF WHO RO-[font=Segoe UI][size=13][color=#745ffc]m the Spaceknight is a superhero, originally a toy and then a magazine lead. Rom was created by Scott Dankman, Richard C. Levy, and Bryan L. McCoy for Parker Brothers and is now a Hasbro asset. After the toy was licensed to Marvel Comics, Rom became a character that debuted in the eponymous Americ[/color][/size][/font]- NONONO STOP IT STOP, JUST PLEASE STOP, ITS HURTING YOUR HEAD LIKE A BITCH, IT JUST KEEPS GETTING LOUDER FUCKING HELL STOP STOP STOP STOP!!!![/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/27-modifica-capelli--gif.gif[/img]

[size=15][justify]NOT EVEN THE END OF THE WORLD AS YOU KNOW IT WILL MAKE YOU CLEAN YOUR ROOM, it's already perfect as it is!!! The party is just going to leave a MESS anyway, why even bother to think of cleaning it, BETTER YET! You can use the already down setup for a murdermistery birthday party BUT NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO THE ONLY THING YOU CAN FOCUS ON RN IS FUCKING MOPS, you are so fucking done with everything.[/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/28.png[/img]


[size=15][justify]You go to check, the corpse that has somehow crashed through the window to your room. You know how “quirky” purple bloods can be, so the question stands; WHO, HOW AND WHAT, managed to hurl this dude's body onto the highest floor of the building but also managed to do him in.

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/29.png[/img]

 It’s mind-boggling to even imagine what on earth could kill one of THE toughest blood castes. One of them quite literally popped his skull out through his mouth with his bare hands because it was “too hot.” Ya know, like we all do from time to time.
You think it’s one of two options; a pack was fucking around your place and one of them wound up dead, or someone got a bone to pick with you on your birthday. It could go either way; both seem plausible. But one thing is for sure, your father figure is going to put all the blame on you while he lovingly cleans up this mess...and hopes you take a lovely trip down a flight of stairs. 
[/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/30-but-she-bigger.gif[/img]

[size=15][justify]Well, it seems that you have to get used to this voice in your head. What was it your bestie called it again, "intrusive thoughts"? You have literally no idea what the fuck they are. If you went based off the way that girl gets so fucking quiet and guilt-ridden while she's practically [i]vibrating[/i] with anxiety and on the verge of tears all day every day...not letting them win seems like a bad fucking idea.
 FUCK IT! You ain't no bitch, and if you're honest, letting those intrusive thoughts win sounds fucking [i]GAS[/i]![/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/31.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]A quick taste test lets you know that this guy’s diet mostly consisted of drugs. Mostly edibles, but also shoe laces, bones and soda? It’s a smooth, robust flavor; still pretty peculiar tasting and your tongue feels a little numb. Oddly enough, this reminds you of the junk you’d find in those liquid thermometers; texture wise at least. Look at you sampling stuff, you’re getting good at this.
On a scale of gross to divine, it’s not that bad. That being said, the smell is making your head do somersaults. What’s that old rumor again? Someone from a different caste drinking a purple troll’s blood gets a vision of the near future or something? [/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/32.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]Luckily for you, you’re smart enough NOT to drink this shit because your mental and physical are bound to get fucked up. It’s not that you’re a picky eater, you’ve got an iron gut and can scarf down whatever you want. Could this potentially kill you? Sure, and that’s why you’re ONLY tasting it of course. 
You’re the kind of weirdo that would suck on a chip drenched in flavor dust. (You’ve gotten pretty good at it too. Some of those chips have all those ridges and grooves that hide the good stuff and you really gotta get with that tongue in order to get it all). Of course you know that sucking the flavor off is WAAAAY healthier than just scarfing down chips. So in with the flavor and out with the now soggy, dustless spud...thing. 
You are a deeeefinitely not the kind of girl who swallows[/size][/justify]

p.c: Question the necessary cruelties of societies
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/33%20da%20correggere.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]Not everything happens for a reason. Sometimes...shit just happens. At any time, on any given day, a troll can just kick the bucket because they took the wrong turn down an alley. All because they didn’t have the skills, weren’t strong enough or some junk. Trolls can join the masses and fill whatever assigned role they’re given or just say “FUCK THE RULES” and do their own thing. Either way, choosing one of those options has consequences...they always do. 
You got lucky with your role. You basically just get to sit back and watch the other pencil pushers in your caste make the hard work as you bring innovations and lead the community. Every now and again you get to have some fun and run the exhibition convention which is public punishment, but in all honesty? You’re just here for the benefits. This kind of role is where the money, is made but GOD you wish to not go through all that red-tape bureaucratic bullshit. EVER[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/34%20da%20correggere.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]At one point, you thought you could pass your role off to the violets and make a deal. Total freedom and in exchange, you write a blank check to sell out the other fuchsias. Why? Cause fuck em, that’s why! That chance came and went however. The role of leader of the violets got passed over to some grub that just BARELY got control of their limbs.
Not only blows up the earlier stated plan, admittedly, it kind of pisses you off that a grub is better at shirking off his responsibilities. [/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/35-iniziale-aggiustamenti-minimi.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]You know good and well that week one of being in charge would result in the most comedic apocalyptic nightmare. Disaster so unnaturally large and down right freakish that there would be no turning back for anyone! So in reality, it’s for the best that you enjoy this laidback lifestyle. What could be better than chilling out with a corpse and snacking on its blood? Maybe hanging out with your gal pals from different castes? Those girls really know how to drag you away from any of your blood relatives, that’s for sure. 
And no you don’t have a group of ONLY girls because you swing that way. You’ve given dating a try, multiple times and really tried to find something serious! But the men around here are SO BORING. It’s hard to find one to have a decent conversation with, let alone keep you interested in a relationship. Honestly, the only thing they’re good at is being a 2 day bed mate before you get bored and toss his corpse in the garden. Or send him to the arena, the purples loooove dealing with your sloppy seconds.
[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%203/36-con-simbolo.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]You can’t shake this feeling however. That even with all this freedom at your fingertips you feel like you’re stuck. It’s vague, almost indescribable but there’s something that’s holding you back, you just can’t put your tongue on it. Does it really matter though? You’re about to have this room stuffed to the ceiling with trolls ready to get down and dirty! With all these bodies bumping and grinding, things are bound to spiral into a group makeout session so intense there’s going to be a thick fog of troll musk spilling out the windows! Peeps are gonna be looking up from the streets like, “DAMN! Either that’s one hell of a fucking party or that shit’s on fire! Fuck, it might be both!”.
It shouldn’t fucking matter but it’s like there’s a switch in your brain that’s flipped or moved some of your priorities around? Whatever it is, an absolute rager of a party should help you loosen up tonight. Besides, you’ve been working EXTRA hard lately. A little distraction is good for the mind so lets get lost in the fucking sauce. 
[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/37%20file%20garden.png[/img]

[size=15][justify]Speaking of sauce, nows probably a good time to get someone to help you take care of this mess. Oh right, the body, probably need to get rid of that first...but how? You can’t go dragging a corpse around and hiding it in a closet or something will have your parental figure busting your balls about proper cadaver removal. You DEFINITELY can’t fit this thing in your captchalogue modus. With that level of toughness you already know it’s going to exceed the weight cap on your captcha. There’s always the possibility of using it like a proper right? Would really put murder in murder party...but a purple troll’s corpse? That’s drama waiting to happen...[/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/38-FOR-PHOTOSHOP-GIF.gif[/img]

[size=15][justify]Though, do you actually give a shit? Everything a fuchsia does causes drama between the other casts. EVERYTHING. All you need to do is walk by and you’ll be the smoking hot gossip around every cup of tea and every glass of whine so who cares if “your actions have consequences?”. The only thing throwing a wrench in all this is not knowing how the purple bloods will react. The only thing YOU KNOW that bothers them is that these guys are CRAZY when it comes to selective breeding. They might actually get serious for once and start looking for a culprit, ending up ruining your day and the party. And who wants to deal with having assassins being sent after them on a night like this? You just want to have fun, hook up with a couple of guys and let the good times roll for the night. But starting trouble like that? Your long night would just get longer, and not in the way you’d hope.[/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/39-FOR-PHOTOSHOP-GIF.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]But hey, think about it for a second. This could actually swing in your favor! Not only is your birthday going to leave a mark on greater society, but this is a turning point of personal growth! Let’s not mince words, you’ve been put up on a pedestal since birth. You can’t talk, let alone interact with people to your own preferences. Sure you got some buddies but those are people you know because of your status and their career’s proximity to it. You can’t just walk down the street, grab some random troll and start making friends out of the blue. It’s the only thing, THE ONLY ASPECT OF FREEDOM, you don’t have. But this? Oh this is a turning point. The thrill, the spice, the danger that was severely lacking from your day to day? It’s not a major step forward mind you. The corpse of a person you don’t even know isn’t some major milestone. But at the very least, it’ll make for some new and interesting encounters.[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/40%20file%20garden.png[/img]

[size=15][justify]Hey don’t forget, you still got one messy problem smeared on your hands...and everything else. The corpse. You can’t just leave it here nor can you walk out COVERED IN HEAPS OF PURPLE BLOOD without making a scene. Though, a new outfit is a rather easy fix isn’t it? And now that you’ve had a moment to see things through, you realize that both problems are a rather easy fix. [/justify][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/corpse-slam03(CLOSED).gif[/img]

[center][size=15]You decide to toss him out the window and pass that problem to someone else [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/42-gif-DONE.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]And to be honest, you are not even mad about the window, you specifically requested for it to be made with cheap glass so the studs you invite over can climb up the buidling and easely smash it if they really want to have a night of fun. and the numbers of trolls that actually did it just prooves that this is yet another one genious idea to had to the pile![/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/43-gif-DONE.gif[/img]

[justify][size=15]Convincing the purple guards on letting them actually do it was frighteningly easy to do, are they even qualified to be guards? becuase they sure seems to cause more problems then resolving them[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/44-1.png[/img]

[center][size=15]And yet, this shithole still seems to hold up[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/45%20CORNA%20POSTER.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]Although, its a pretty looking shithole, got to give it that, makes you wanna go down and cause trouble.[/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/46.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]BUT, before that, you got to get in conctact with the girl that will basically solve the "situation" for you.[/size][/justify]

p.c: Go to the absolute unit of your computer and get a volounteer
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/47.png[/img]

[size=15][justify]Pinnacle of tecnology right there, a good cowerker of fine tastes built it for you, spit on it and badabim badaboom, something that can run 2956 tabs, no ads whatsoever and can basicallly click anywhere and everywhere on the web with zero repercussions![/justify][/size]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/49%20correzzione.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/50%20correzione.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/51-animated-DONE.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/UPDATE%204/52%20animated%20apng.png[/img] [spoiler open="Open Spittalk" close="Close Spittalk"]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/54%20animated.png[/img]

[size=15][justify]"Work smarter, not harder!” Not just a good motto to live by, it’s YOUR motto. Not only do you live by it, you’ve found the most genius way to execute it! Just dump all of life’s troubles into the laps of other “more qualified” trolls and boom! It’s in [b]THEIR[/b] capable hands now. Plus Midala is the kind of girl that gets so wrapped up in her anxieties over consequences and potential praise that she’d sooner die than slip up! And you’re grateful that she’s so dedicated to the cause. Honestly, it’s a breath of fresh air having someone you can [b]ACTUALLY[/b] rely on![/justify][/size]

p.c: Romana: Weren't you planning a party?
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/55.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Admittedly, the smell in the room is starting to make you gag. Is it enough to push you to clean your room? Absolutely not! That’s what Midala is for and she can take care of that after she’s done with the body! It is a little inconvenient that she isn’t good at multitasking though, would have been far more time efficient. But the less trolls that know about this, the better so the least you can do is change your clothes. [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/56.png[/img]

[justify][size=15]It IS kind of your fault for not thinking things through and leaning on a bleeding corpse of all things. Definitely rocking a stain in the back and ruining your favourite outfit all because you wanted to do something cool like striking a comfy pose on some dead purple blood’s ass. Actually, hearing that idea rattle around in your skull again does sound pretty cool, in fact you just scrubbed yourself clean of what little guilt you were feeling. IN FACT; NEW RULE! Going forward, trying out cool and badass shit outranks the need to keep your fit fresh. [/size][/justify]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/1-0002.gif[/img]

[size=40][b][color=#bfff0f][font=Impact]<shake intensity="100">IN A MINUTE!</shake>[/font][/color][/b][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/56-B2-ANIMATED.gif[/img]

[size=15][color=#93ff53]FOR FUCK SAKES STOP DE-RAILING MY TRAIN OF THOUGHT! "Oh do this! Oh check those footprints! " MOTHER FUCKER I SEE THE BLOODY MARKS, THERE'S NO NEED TO POINT THEM OUT LIKE IM BLIND. Now shut up and let me do MY THING![/color][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/56-B3.gif[/img]

[size=15][color=#93ff53][justify] I will listen to you intrusive thoughts WHEN i want to or WHEN i will request for mental assistance, can't believe im saying this but APPERENTLY ME IGNORING YOU UP UNTILL NOW WAS NOT AN ENOUGH CLEAR HINT F- [/justify][/color][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/56-B4.png[/img]

[size=15][center]and then you get struck with a sudden realization[/center][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%205/56-B5.png[/img]

[size=15][center]there is no-one here dumbfuck[/center][/size]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/2.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/3.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Alright, you’ve sat on these thoughts long enough! Not only is it in your best interest to straight up ignore the yap session going on in your skull, you should do literally [i]anything else[/i]. Let 'em stew, make ‘em beg and grovel for your attention. Honestly though? The more you think about it, the more you realize you might have become so self absorbed your brain literally started manifesting intrusive thoughts just so you can talk to your favorite person; YOU![/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/4.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Either way, you’re the head bitch in charge around here. You do what YOU want, when you want and no one, not even your own self manifested critics, can tell you what to do! They just gotta sit back and watch you work your magic. That being said, you should do a fit check real quick. As badass as that corpseplaying was, it did get kind of messy. TO THE WARDROBE![/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/6.png[/img]

[center][size=15]There’s no way to overstate just how incomprehensibly gaudy this wardrobe is. Yes, yes it OFFENSIVELY huge, but if people knew the kind of wood working that went into making it? Smooth to the touch, soft against the skin yet somehow it’s some of the toughest around! Most people couldn’t even name it, and those that could wouldn’t bother trying to figure out how to source it. All you know is that there’s a boatload of it in here. Get it? Cause that ship must have been fucking [b]MASSIVE?![/b] It really makes that gold trim feel all the more opulent considering the rarity.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/7.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Speaking of huge, DAYUMN. That’s one BIG ASS stain huh? Waaaay bigger than you thought it’d be. Honestly? This skirt probably isn’t even worth saving. Might as well burn it right, one less piece of evidence to tie you to any crimes. That top on the other hand? The things you’ve gone to get it? Yeah, no, you’re not letting this piece go any time soon. [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/8.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Truth be told you aren’t even sure if Midala can clean this shit off. If by some miracle she manages to save this top, and that’s a slim margin, you might actually have to...reward her?! At the very least, if you absolutely HAVE to that is, you could always arrange a date or two as her form of payment. Heck, you might be able to cure her anxiety a little if you find a troll or two to blow her back out because WOW is that girl pent the fuck [b]UP[/b]. Which is a damn shame because she’s got one heck of a body. That is why you hired her after all.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/9.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Money’s no good to her anyways, she doesn’t know how to spend it! She just keeps it all stashed away in some hoard like some old lady. The only time she shows even a little bit of personality and backbone is when she asks for a raise. It’s the only time she shows any grit because the SECOND you wanna have some good and spicy girl talk, or just rant about boys with her she gets all flustered and changes the subject. LAMEASS.
[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/10.png[/img]

[center][size=15]And it only gets you so frustrated because you see all that potential going to WASTE. She could be a bad bitch, hell, she could be an apex maneater if she just let her hair down a little! But even with your efforts, there’s some cosmic force, some invisible hand that keeps your and your little side project at square 0. You might not be able to bring another girl up with you, but nothing is going to stop you from being the pinnacle of bad bitches everywhere. [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/11.png[/img]

[center][size=15]And lets be real, you’re fucking CRUSHING that shit. The hips, the thighs, the tits, THE ASS; damn girl you are [b]seeeexy[/b]. If thrones could speak, they’d be begging and foaming at the mouth with eternal gratitude whenever you decide to rest your perfect ass down for a quick meeting. If you ever manage to get your act together and you know, actually lead for a change? Your followers will gleefully follow behind you, watching your every step and sway, because for them? The best way to live their lowly lives is by following you around.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/12.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Ooop! What’s this? If painting is a passion you can pursue it another time...and ya know, not use your hair as the brush? Time to open your silladex and see if you can get something that might help with it. This would have been sooo much easier if you could just captchalogue the corpse but purple bloods are some of the DENSEST motherfuckers around in terms of constitution. You are already doing quite the workout with your silladex being in the [b]"OVERWEIGHT"[/b] state, and let's not make the a way bigger burden that it is.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/13.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Time for the big guns! Let’s be honest, you’ve been itching for a good excuse to put this bad boy to use. Plus, it’s just rad as hell. [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/14-HAIRFIX.png[/img]

[center][size=15][i]Magnum[/i] over here literally consumes so much power that the first time you saw the bill, you hatched the brilliant idea of having some random caste take over the payments for you. It’s their way of paying you back for having to tolerate all their whining. Seriously, how needy can a group of trolls get? Constantly asking for this and that, make our lives easier. BOO-HOO-HOO.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/15.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Let’s make some fucking noise.[/size][/center]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/16-HAIRFIX.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/17.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/18.3.gif[/img]

[center][size=15]The shockwave that follows is damn near thermonuclear. The vibrations alone have your muscles locked with involuntary spasms. You can feel your blood cells boiling in your veins and threatening to burst through the vessels on your skin. Your bones are rattling with that frequency so hard it feels like they’re alive and jumping! Your fins and air puff out, blown back by the overwhelming air pressure. The inside of your skull feels like a fireworks show, brain cells bursting against the bone in spectacular ruptures that truly set your dopamine levels to new heights! In other words. [b]THIS IS FUCKING AWESOME[/b].[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/19-ANIMATED.png[/img]

[center][size=15]The way your body is fucking SCREAMING for you to get off your ass has you on your feed and BOBBING THAT FUCKING NECK. HELL YEAH GIRL. HEADBANG TILL IT ROLLS OFF YOUR SHOULDERS. [/size][/center]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/20.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/21.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Phew! Hey look at all that blood and glass! Hard to tell if it looked better on the floor now that it’s studded and streaked all over the walls right? Eugh, this is gonna be such a pain in the ass to clean. Almost makes you feel a little sad for Midala. But you know what really makes you feel for the poor girl?[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/22.gif[/img]

[center][size=15]FOR NOT HAVING HAIR LIKE THIS! Look at the volume, the density, the sheen! Genetic boons really take things up a notch huh? Your cast having the whole “water tribe” vibe, means your hair is just naturally hydrophobic without drying it! It stays lush, straight and silky smooth in a clearly unfair display of winning the genetics lottery. It does have downsides though, usually in the form of other people who can’t keep their hands to themselves. Or the ones that ask too many damn questions. “What shampoo do you use? How long do you condition it for,? What’s your routine?” Sure it’s warranted, anyone would wanna look this good, but it’s still annoying. Or it would be, if you couldn’t turn right around and hit them with, “Oh, it’s just good genes” and MEAN THAT SHIT. Suck it land dwellers![/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/23.png[/img]

[size=15][center]There are...[i]some[/i] downsides. Your skin is already sensitive as can be, yet somehow touching your own hair actually irritates it?! What kind of ironic bullshit is this?! You don’t know the full details, because who’s trying to listen to all that deep ancient lore? But someone did explain it as something your predecessor did and now you’re facing the consequences? You should be submerged in sea water right now. Maybe not constantly, but you really should be under the waves for a majority of your life time. For whatever reason, the second gen fuchsias decided they were too good to live by the water. So now you, the third gen, have gotta put up with some weird and uncomfortably growing pains so hopefully the next gen can fully adapt?! Sucks to be them though, they’re probably gonna lose out on the hair AND skin benefits.[/center][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/24noline.png[/img]

[center][size=15]Alright, enough moping. Now that you’ve probably knocked some sense into yourself, it’s time to make the most important decision of the day. A choice so critical it requires every ounce of attention you’ve got in that pretty little head of yours...Which outfit combo is really gonna make your figure shine the brightest?![/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/yomama.png[/img]

[left]Did not expect to see an update ay? 

So ill just go straight to the point and respond probably the first question everyone would make, 
"what happend?"

Life happend, stuff just kept getting piled up and honestly, made me think! I decided to get rid of socials, didn't want to keep around the internet for a good while, it did not bother me that much, but gosh darn it bit me in the ass alot to think i was leaving this comic as well. So i decided to continue it.

Will i come back to socials? Hell no, especially with their current state lol, so don't expect any nsfw comeback. The only nsfw you will see from me is in this comic, and it will be mostly pinup stuff and just vanilla nudity or something, not gonna see any straight up banging in here that is for sure! I actually want to explore more fights and more cool stuff! That will be my New years resolution so expect that as well! I don't want this comic to just being talked about the sexy ladies i wanna get some good ol hype going, that'll be a fun challenge.

MAYBE, a solid maybe, i could make a social media for just the adventure in the future as sort of keep myself in touch with the readers and show doodles, i like doodles. But thats like a slim chance. BUT what i will leave here will be an email [b][color=#93ff53](drinkingproblemmspfa@gmail.com)[/color][/b]. In case if any of you makes like fanart of the adventure and wanted to show me, or wanted to leave a message or contact me that it's not the comment section in the site. [color=#ffffff]DON'T ASK ME FOR COMMISSION, i'll tell you right here and now i WON'T take any, so don't even bother. 
[/color]
Welp, that is all i had to say me thinks. The only thing left for me to do is to thank all of you, that sticked around for a possible comback of this fandaventure, it means alot. a whole lot. So i wish for all of you a start for a Good year! 

Ps:.
Well shit i just saw the prices for graphics cards went up to 5k. Damn

Pps:.
Just realized tha page number of this, eh, nice.[/left]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/27.gif[/img]

[size=15][center]It’s okay, take your time. It’s not like you don’t have a MASSIVE collection of pieces to comb through or anything. Skimpy, formal, casual, even something dorky; if it can be thrown over those curves, you can rock anything and everything you put your mind to! Good genes and a killer sense of style? You really have an unfair advantage over the masses don’t you? Even if they can’t always see it, you know how to look good with or without an audience. [/center][/size]


[left][size=13][color=#93ff53]Thanks again to [url=https://mspfa.com/user/?u=108896424844158889184]Gutworm[/url] for being this page's guest artist![/color][/size][/left]
[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/28.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/29.png[/img]

[center][size=15]This couldn’t have been a more terrifying sight. Naked rods, empty hangers, you’ve never even SEEN the back of the wardrobe and now it was all out in the open! Hollow, empty, completely barren.  HOW?! HOW THE FUCK IS IT ACTUALLY EMPTY?!
[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/30.gif[/img]

[size=15][center]There’s no way Midala is hording ALL of your clothes right? There’s no way she left with not a single thing to wear...RIGHT?! She sit on her ass, thinking of sleeping while leaving you butt naked...RIGHT?![/center][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/31.gif[/img]

[center][size=15]The very thought of your wardrobe, this massive collection of beautiful garments, and not having a SINGLE OUTFIT TO WEAR?! It really hits a girl where it hurts. A real slap to your pride! Just...NOTHING.[/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/32.png[/img]

[center][size=15]OH WELL! That’s about all the anger you could afford to spend today. You’re definitely going to have to let Midala know what you think about her...decisions. She better hope whatever birthday present she’s about to give you doesn’t make you bring down the hammer on her ass any harder than you were already. [/size][/center]

[img]https://file.garden/ZHJq_mLYvB6VkLhe/Drinking%20problem/Update%206/33.gif[/img]

[center][size=15]Besides, you’re a quick thinker. You can easily make something up on the fly! Better yet, you can MAKE someone grab you exactly what you need! There’s gotta be something worth putting on somewhere around the hive. You’ve stripped and tossed clothes all over the place after a night out. Ya know, feels good to just be free after having to be social for so long and who doesn’t mind being half naked in their own hive?![/size][/center]
